summary: This mod delevels and improves Daedric and Aedric Artifacts significantly. It also delevels various other levelled items throughout Skyrim. Requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
Requires Dawnguard & Dragonborn.

Daedric and Aedric Artifacts now have Unlimited Charge and improved Enchantments where I felt it was neccasary. These are artifacts of the Aedra and Daedra; they should be immensely powerful and beyond anything that a mere mortal could craft and not trinkets that quickly become just another curiosity.

If I missed anything, be sure to let me know.

List of Changes:

All Daedric / Aedric Artifacts have unlimited uses
Rueful Axe now drains more Stamina
Dawnbreaker now deals both Fire and Sun damage
Aetherial Staff now has 5,000 Charges [Former 1,000]
Harkon's Sword now has 5,000 Charges [Former 3,000]
Keening can now be tempered with Moonstone and is worth significantly more
Mehrunes' Razor now drains 50 Health
Sanguine Rose now summons a Daedra for 300 seconds
Skull of Corruption now deals 20 Dreamsteal, 80 Waking Nightmare and 30 Psychic Agony [+100%]
Staff of Magnus now absorbs 75 Magicka and 75 Health [Former 20]
Volendrung now absorbs 50 Stamina for 5 Secs
Aetherial Shield grants a slightly higher armour rating
Masque of Clavicus Vile now Fortifies Barter 40, Persuasion 20 and Regens Magicka 20%
Ring of Hircine now resists 20% Magic
Savior's Hide now grants 50% Disease Resist
Shield of Ysgramor now Fortifies Health by 40 [Former 20]
Spellbreaker Ward increased to 100 pts [Former 50]
Spellbreaker now resists 25% Magic
Miraak's Staff now has 5,000 Charges [Former 3,000]
Miraak's Sword now has 75 Charges [Former 25]
Miraak's Staff and Sword are deleveled
Miraak's entire outfit is now classified as Clothing with appropriate keywords, etc.
Miraak's outfit is now deleveled
Nightingale outfit is deleveled
Chillrend, Dragonbane, Gauldur Blackblade, Gauldur Blackbow, Lunar Weapons, Shield of Solitude, Nightingale Hood, Nightingale Armour, Nightingale Gauntlets, Nightingale Boots, Amulet of Articulation and Mage's Circlet are now deleveled
Amulet of Articulation no longer has an armour rating

If you like Artifdurhur mur dur derp you may also enjoy Mage Apparel Overhaul:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34543/?
author: Kozoi
